bibl.title: Divine and Human Feet: Records of Pilgrims Honouring Isis.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 360-362: votive feet inscriptions found in the temple of Isis of Philae.

bibl.title: Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods

bibl.seg: TAKÁCS Sarolta A., Divine and Human Feet: Records of Pilgrims Honouring Isis.
Jas ELSNER and Ian RUTHERFORD (Edd.), Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods (Oxford, 2005) pp. 353-369.
See in part. pp. 360-362: votive feet inscriptions found in the temple of Isis of Philae.
